articles.title: Rare show of Northern Lights dazzles North America - BBC
articles.description: One of the most intense geomagnetic storm in years paints skies across the region green, purple and pink.
articles.content:
Hues of pink, purple and green streaked the skies in North America overnight in a dazzling display of Northern Lights.
Weather officials said the aurora, which was seen from California to New York, … [+1748 chars]
